News.headline: Eastleigh FC Match Arrangements
News.short_description: For our Vanarama National League match versus Eastleigh FC the away supporters will be allocated in the AGP Steel Family Stand
News.description:
The home Family section will, for this match, be rows A-E and seats 1-20 in the Carling Stand.Â 

Home Family Stand season ticket holders are requested to exchange voucher 21 for a seat in the Carling Stand between now and Saturday 1st April from the ticket office.

This will mean that only home supporters will be able to use the Traditional Builders Stand for this match.

Any advance ticket purchases for all sections of the ground can be made here or by calling the ticket office on 0208 592 1549 ext. 21
